query: I need to organize a 3-day trip for a group of 3, departing from Asheville and arriving in Minneapolis. We will be traveling from March 7th to March 9th, 2022, with a total budget of $2,300. We require accommodations that allow pets and provide entire rooms. Regarding meals, our group enjoys a variety of cuisines, including Indian, Chinese, Mediterranean, and American.
planner_results:
Day 1:
Current City: from Asheville to Minneapolis
Transportation: Self-driving, from Asheville to Minneapolis, Duration: 15 hours 47 mins, Distance: 1,711 km, Cost: $85
Breakfast: The Cafe, Minneapolis
Attraction: Minneapolis Sculpture Garden, Minneapolis
Lunch: Court Avenue Brewing Company, Minneapolis
Dinner: Texas Roadhouse, Minneapolis
Accommodation: #1 Rated 3br Park Slope Apt (1700sqf+Renovated!), Minneapolis (Pet-friendly, No parties & No pets)

Day 2:
Current City: Minneapolis
Transportation: -
Breakfast: Monkeypod Kitchen by Merriman, Minneapolis
Attraction: Mill City Museum, Minneapolis; Minnehaha Falls, Minneapolis
Lunch: Agent Jack's Bar, Minneapolis
Dinner: Balbeer's Kitchen & Bar, Minneapolis
Accommodation: #1 Rated 3br Park Slope Apt (1700sqf+Renovated!), Minneapolis

Day 3:
Current City: Minneapolis
Transportation: -
Breakfast: FreshMenu, Minneapolis
Attraction: Mall of America®, Minneapolis; American Swedish Institute, Minneapolis
Lunch: Oregano India, Minneapolis
Dinner: Purani Dilli's Al Karam Kebab House, Minneapolis
Accommodation: -
